name: LOGistICAL: British Isles
description: LOGistICAL:British Isles is a large open-world, strategy, puzzle game where you transport different cargoes to complete all the towns throughout the country with over 2000 towns to Complete. LOGistICAL: British Isles game covers England, Scotland, Wales, Northern and Southern Ireland, the Isle of Man, the Bailiwick of Jersey and the...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: 256+MB with 1024x768 resolution Storage: 300 MB available space
